CustomField.formula: AssignedContact.FirstName & IF(AssignedContact.MiddleName="", "", " " & AssignedContact.MiddleName) & " " & AssignedContact.LastName & IF(AssignedContact.Suffix="", "", ", " & AssignedContact.Suffix)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Full name (including middle name, suffix, etc.) for the Report Contact.
CustomField.label: Name
